name: GroupingValue

methods.name: getGroupings
methods.description: Returns a list of second- or third-level row or column groupings. If there are none, the value is an empty array.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier for a row or column grouping. The identifier is used by the fact map to specify data values within each grouping.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the localized display name of a row or column grouping. For date and time fields, the label is the localized date or time.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the value of the field that is used as a row or column grouping.

description: Contains grouping values for a row or column, including the key, label, and value.
